IN.IC: je oblika za sedanjik, preteklik in pretekli deležnik.

sense.def:
To get rid of something or someone
pomeni ukrepati tako, da ne bi več imeli opravka z nezaželeno stvarjo ali osebo.

seg.quote: She bathed thoroughly to get rid of the last traces of make-up.
We had to get rid of the director.

sense.def:
To rid a place or oneself of something
pomeni poskrbeti, da nekaj neprijetnega ali nadležnega ne obstaja več nekje ali ne vpliva več na nas;

seg.quote: We must rid the country of this wickedness.
He had rid himself of his illusions.
Eric was glad to be rid of him.
